messages.content: Building a brighter future for Wantage Constituency

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Start to build a more open and tolerant future for everyone.
Start focusing on low carbon, genuinely affordable homes.
Protect local NHS funding and save our community hospitals.

mentions.candidate: Richard Benwell lives in the constituency near Faringdon. He is an environmental campaigner.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Lib Dems can beat the Conservatives.

issues.brexitEurope: fights for a stronger future beyond Brexit, which will be so damaging to the economy of our thriving market towns and communities.
issues.environment: focus on low-carbon standard homes, cleaner, greener and affordable local development, a greener and fairer economy, acting on climate change.
issues.health: protect local NHS funding and save our community hospitals.

community.content: low carbon standard homes, stop local planning being overruled.

leaflet.personalStatement: I want to refocus attention on what really matters: building a greener, fairer economy and a just society, protecting the NHS, and taking strong national and international action to stop climate change.

quotes.text: "I want to refocus attention on what really matters: building a greener, fairer economy and a just society, protecting the NHS, and taking strong national and international action to stop climate change."

images.caption: Richard is aiming for cleaner, greener and affordable local development.

examples: I want to refocus attention on what really matters: building a greener, fairer economy and a just society, protecting the NHS, and taking strong national and international action to stop climate change.
Richard Benwell is an environmental campaigner who has spent many years fighting for stronger laws to stop climate change and create a better environment for everyone.
Protect local NHS funding and save our community hospitals.
Start to build a more open and tolerant future for everyone.
Start focusing on low carbon, genuinely affordable homes.

personalStories.story: Richard Benwell lives in the constituency near Faringdon.

examples: Have removed local planning from the Didcot area and forbidden elected councillors to discuss it publicly.
Intent on pushing through a hard Brexit whatever the cost to the country and our area.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Richard Benwell lives in the constituency near Faringdon.

examples: Richard Benwell lives in the constituency near Faringdon.
